t: Self Publish children's books | Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing
s: When I published my first title ... and self-publishing was about as cool as a canker sore. At the time, the only thing I had to show for my writing was a computer full of stories and a binder full of rejections. I taught during the day, worked for a catering company on the weekends, and wrote as often as possible. I did what writers were "supposed to do": ... Writing wasn't paying the bills, and I had two young children to provide ...
